articles.author: Don Silas
articles.title: Ronaldo's former teammate set to join him at Al-Nassr - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's new club Al Nassr are targeting the Portugal captain's former Juventus team-mate, Juan Cuadrado. Having secured the signing of Ronaldo, Al Nassr are reportedly keen to take more high-profile players from Europe's top leagues in the ongoing…
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo’s new club Al Nassr are targeting the Portugal captain’s former Juventus team-mate, Juan Cuadrado.
Having secured the signing of Ronaldo, Al Nassr are reportedly keen to take more … [+651 chars]

articles.title: Meta fined more than $400 million over ad targeting practices - CBS News
articles.description: Ireland bans Facebook owner from forcing European users to agree to personalized ads based on their online activity.
articles.content: Irish regulators on Wednesday hit Facebook parent Meta with hundreds of millions in fines for online privacy violations and banned the company from forcing European users to agree to personalized ads… [+1958 chars]
